title: Window focus and blur events are not being emitted on macOS and Linux
body:
<!-- BEFORE YOU FILE A NEW ISSUE-->
<!--

0. Please search open issues before duplicating a new one.

  - rustc 
  - ALL relevant Tauri Libs
2. You must attach the results of cargo tauri info or yarn tauri info to your issue.
3. Make sure it is an issue with Tauri, and not something to do with your side of the stack.
4. Consider starting a discussion. Speaking of which, have you looked there? Maybe your question has been answered.

### **Describe the bug**
`tauri://focus` and `tauri://blur` are not being emitted on macOS (and on Linux it seems). 

Other events are working just fine.

### **To Reproduce**
Add window event listeners:

```
appWindow.listen("tauri://focus", ({event, payload}) => {
  console.log(event)
  console.log(payload)
})
appWindow.listen("tauri://blur", ({event, payload}) => {
  console.log(event)
  console.log(payload)
})
```

### **Expected behavior**
Events being emitted.
